about_the_game:
This template is the first party GameCreator game template - 《Jump of Sky》. IIt is a ACT game template without any built-in combat system.
The template contains the functions of GameCreator engine and the core system unique to the template as well as the editor.

Use difficulty

★★

Joystick and SteamDeck support

Core functions

The following is a demonstration of some functional effects

● Self-developed lightweight physical system: gravity, movement, multi-section jump, sprint, climbing, etc

● Water world, with additional resistance in water

● Climbing ability, which can make climbing ability after picking up relevant item

● Conveyor belt and pushing object

● Hidden block: it will appear after touching

● Key, lock, switch button

● Moving block and load

● Ice: When the movement stops, there will be additional inertia to make the character slide
● Speed block: it will move more slowly when standing on the speed block
● Elastic block: after touching, it will bounce the player in a certain direction
● Condition blocks: these condition blocks will disappear automatically after picking the specified item
● Trap: the character will die after encountering the trap
● No jumping block: you can't jump when standing on the no jumping block
● Jump refresh block: the number of jumps will be refreshed after touching the jump refresh block, and it is allowed to jump again
● Vanishing block: standing on the disappearing block, the block will gradually disappear, and then automatically appear after a period of time
● Sensing block: sense the jumping behavior of the player, and disappear or appear after each jump
● Transfer block: can be transferred to the specified coordinate or scene
● Indicator: the preset prompt text can be displayed after contacting the indicator
● Archive block: it can be archived immediately after touching
● Various props: such as keys, gold coins, multi-section jumping props, sprint props, climbing props, transformation props, etc
● More features are waiting for you to experience!

How to use the template

● Draw the tile on the map to make the terrain

● Place the function block on the map
● Start the game

Advanced Extension

● The trigger and force module allow visualization to achieve various physical effects (such as climbing, conveyor belt and other functional blocks)

● The avatar allows the bounding box to be designed frame by frame to dynamically change the collision volume during playback
● Advanced developers can modify and extend script programs and make plug-ins

Rules on material utilization

● The built-in materials of the template is allowed to be commercially available.

● If it is used in a non GameCreator engine, you need to purchase GameCreator software and indicate the source of GameCreator
● It is not allowed to resell slightly modified material versions, but free sharing is allowed and must be the same as this rule.

name: GameCreator - ACT - 空之跃 - Jump of sky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i3-3200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT750及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i5-4460+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980及以上
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
